segments.text: Hello , is it necessary to do warm-up exercise ? I can't wait to dive into the water .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm sorry . Every customer coming here must do the warm-up exercise before getting down to swimming . That's out regulation .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , I see . You are just doing your job . But I wanna know what the advantages it has .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: OK , lovely boy . Try to be patient . Do you know the danger of swimming without warm-up ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: As far as I know , people will be weak if they swim too long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's right . But the most dangerous thing is that their legs may spasm out of control when swimming .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it very dangerous ? I'm a little scared . Do you offer the lifebuoy for us ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , besides that , we also provide our customers with goggles , swimming suit and something like that .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you have the workers to save me if anything should happen ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Of course , all the workers here are able to swim , and they will come to your aid quickly .
segments.speaker: S2
